Department of Agriculture () is a village and government facility in Nazluchay Rural District  (Approval date) 1366/02/02 (Iranian Jalali calendar) |date=22 April 1987  |script-title=fa:ایجاد و تشکیل 20 دهستان شامل روستاها، مزارع و مکانهای در شهرستان ارومیه تابع استان آذربایجان غربی |trans-title=‌Creation and formation of 20 rural districts including villages, farms and places in Urmia County under West Azerbaijan province |url=https://lamtakam.com/law/council_of_ministers/110051 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20251102155135/https://lamtakam.com/law/council_of_ministers/110051 |archive-date=2 November 2025 |access-date=2 November 2025 |website= [Lam ta Kam] |publisher= [Ministry of the Interior] |agency= [Council of Ministers] |language=fa |id= [ID] 7DD016E4-E840-4986-9FDD-044DD3A0B2EE.  [Course number] 66.}} of Nazlu District in Urmia County, West Azerbaijan province, Iran.
Demographics
Population
At the time of the 2006 National Census, the village's population was 72 in 20 households. The following census in 2011 counted 2,484 people in 26 households. The 2016 census measured the population of the village as 1,892 people in 14 households.
